description: Data was generated using the CytogenInv table. Karyotype nomenclature was processed using a syntax checker that validated the string for use with the CytoConverter software.

fields.description: Number of characters in karyotype nomenclature string
fields.name: KaryLength

fields.description: Karyotype description if it exceeds a certain length
fields.name: KaryLong

fields.description: Indicates if the karyotype has been corrected by the syntax checker
fields.name: Message

fields.description: Reason(s) for invalidating aberrations in the karyotype
fields.name: Reason

fields.description: Karyotype nomenclature that was used as input to CytoConverter. The nomenclature may have been modified by the syntax checker.
fields.name: CytoConvInput
